overview: When the sexual urge hits and surges to the surface, whether you're alone or with a "soon-to-be significant other" - you need to go for it. Get it on, and get it off. In Jet Set's Straight Edge: Volume Seven, nine hot, muscular, well-hung guys respond to this urge and give it their all in seven sizzling sex scenes, over two hours of orgiastic action. Long-time porn favorite Jason Adonis makes two appearances, as do Andrew Blue and Landon Mycles. Berke Banks, Hayden Stephens, Spencer Whitman, Tristan Jaxx and Dylan Roberts all contribute their considerable talents to the action.
title: Straight Edge: Volume 7
